resources.string:
You can search for transaction using
mobile number for prepaid recharges
and consumer number for electricity
 and DTH recharge
Please confirm the operator and\nmobile number before proceeding

Recharge information 
 -send sms to 5959 as follows(cost 30 fils): 
 R * Recharge Voucher No * Salik Account No * Salik Pin No 
 -Visit www.salik.ae 
 -Call 800-SALIK(72545)

To Make a call: 
 -Dial 800-Hello (800-43556) 
 -Enter the 15 digit secret code followed by the # key 
 -Enter the international number you wish to call followed by the # key 
 -(Example. Call 80043556 <15 digit Pin Number > # <009198XXX XXXXX> # ) 
 -Calls are charged on a per minute basis 
 -Expired/partially used/damaged/lost cards will not be replaced or refunded 
 -Terms & conditions apply 
 -CUSTOMER CARE: 800122 (Toll Free Number)
This is a FIVE calling voucher. \n (Valid for 15 days from 1st call) \n Dial 800505,Enter pin number,press#,dial number with country code & press #

To recharge: Dial *120*Card number#
 To check your balance: Dial *121#. 
 To view data and voice offers: Dial *101# or download the my Etisalat UAE App. 
 To earn FREE Smiles points with every Wasel recharge: Download the Smiles app and enjoy tons of saving deals.
Customer care: 800101
To recharge more time: Dial *135* card number #\nTo recharge more data:Dial *131* card number #.\nCustomer care: 800155
dial *101*1*6*3# to understand Your last 10 transactions

To recharge your Virigin Mobile account
dial *149*Recharge Number#.
 You can check your balance by
calling*145#.

13+ y.o. Restrictions apply. Please
refer to
for full terms.
